cab_descripcion: Hi! I'm Valentina, an engineer passionate about programming and robotics. At 23 years old, I love learning, solving problems and creating impactful technological solutions.
per_descripcion_1: I'm passionate about developing applications, games and iOT projects with microcontrollers.
per_descripcion_2: I enjoy working in a team where I can combine my experience in web development and my interest in technology to create innovative solutions.
per_descripcion_3: I'm always looking for new challenges that allow me to learn and grow professionally.
